documents.document: The quieter a try to be when a come in fae backshift, the more racket a seem to make

What a film Dead Man's Shoes is!

@LaurenGillogley haha nah we gave it a miss. Am backshift next week 😏
@LaurenGillogley aye right enough 😂 some laugh ae, gutted we never done karaoke but

Never drinking on a school night again. Am fuckin hingin 😩😭

@LorryLORRYx @RyanCordner94 nut no chance. A milky bar yoghurt is what I'd imagine a cloud to taste like
@RyanCordner94 nae contest! Milky bar is a wee tub of heaven
@hammy1471 few pints, few more pints, couple halfs then a few more pints haha
@hammy1471 a only came out for a 'few pints' at 2 haha
@rossmac92 @RyanCordner94 nut! I'd rather wear jump leads on ma baws than huaraches
@rossmac92 @RyanCordner94 still smarter than the things half the 'hipsters' wear to the twig these days
@RyanCordner94 @rossmac92 more like a belt now, a drove by him the other day. Feck all left to them haha

What is mans greatest creation?
A say lager
Am working at 6 the morra morning and av just booked a taxi for half 5 so a can stay oot. A love Sunday's
@mcomiskey90 naw a few halfs in between

Ma mates burd has left him. She took his Bob Marley cd's and the satellite dish.
No woman no sky
Got taxi driver to take me to the garage for a feast last night. Woke up way ma bed covered in doritos and m&m's
Anybody driving?

SEE THAT GIRL, WATCH THAT SCENE, DIGGIN THE DANCING QUEEN
@mcomiskey90 nah no the night mate, nearly shutting time
SCOOTER ARE YOU READY

@elaine_ramsay2 😂😂 a canny wait
Here for a good time, no a long time! When one door shuts, another door opens
'Bout time https://t.co/k61HQnKbWL
G'day mate, let's put another shrimp on the barbie
Just finished sons of anarchy again. Av never felt so emotionally attached to a tele programme 😭😭
@AndyT1872 am opening up at 6 masel the morn. Prolly get ambushed
@AndyT1872 he was defo one ae the good guys
@steedie67 it gets better! Our gaffer picked the shite up and dumped it right in front ae their caravan door 😂😂 we're at war over a car park
@steedie67 one ae them shat on the path 😂😂😭
@steedie67 they caught me trying to take a picture, that'll be ma tyres gettin slashed
Gypsies have actual moved into ma work, none ae us can get in the car park 😂 my big fat gypsy industrial estate
@AndyT1872 a ken the words and just learned it on guitar 😭😭
It is a tune to be fair
Been singing the sash aw day. A swear am a Tim 😩🍀
@gauld_x I've never actually replaced a screen but I can give it a bash. Managed to do my battery n that, screens can't be much harder
Am a nightmare for dropping ma phone. Go through they protective screens like there's nae tomorrow
Two nights in a row av been back in the hotel for 12. Cannot handle it anymore man
Nooocastle
100 goals in 120 games, Suarez is shite
You can wait for a lifetime, to spend your days in the sooonshiiiiiinnnee
A was moaning about aw the glasses in the house being too wee so ma mum went n bought these fuckers 😂 https://t.co/dAGs8Z2iiE
Life ain't easy for a boy named Sue
A seen Scooter live last year. 2016 will never be topped
Now that am sober, a can actually take in and appreciate what happened yesterday. We came fae behind and beat them at ibrox 😂🍀
Love aw ma pals dearly! Am lucky to have so many x
Social media is riddled with bitterness the day 😂
Rougher than a rough hing fae roughaslovakia
A reckon it would be easier breaking into the White House than it is putting bed covers on
Meant to write 'to my wonderful mother' on her xmas card and wrote wonderwall instead ae wonderful
2 stone off 💪🏻👊🏻 canny believe how big a used to be sur
Brand new £125 shirt, rose wine aw down it. Never fail Sean 😡

@GaryCook95 a came back fae the loo and asked what songs a had missed.
"Live forever"
Superb when a 91st minute goal gets wrongly chopped off to do ye out of £130
Wonder if Armstrong gets a goalscoring bonus. Could pay to get that fuckin monstrosity on his napper cut
Should've went to the dentist when this fill in first fell out. Woke up looking like the elephant man 😩 whole side of ma face is swelt up
Don't know how folk can want to go out for food n that when they're rough. A just want to lie in darkness and no talk to anybody
Buzzin for a day oot with the Steedman clan for ma granda's 70th 🍺🍻🍷🍸🍹🍼☕️🍵🍶🍾
He sipped another rum n coke, told a dirty joke 🎸🎤🍻💃🏻🍺 1 week #OCS

@theweasel1980 al have a look mate
@CallumMillar12 ideal! As long as there's nae pain am staying away. Fuckin hate the place
Ma fill in just fell clean oot when a was eating pizza. Can a just leave it or will it get sair? Dentists freak me oot
Just finished the longest backshift ever and had to spend 20 minutes scraping ma motor. Am a bawhair away fae greetin 😢
Wit happened to Bob the builder? Who's this clown? https://t.co/ZTf2RxADFO
Loads ae pikeys staying next to ma work and ma boss drove by at 6am way his windows down and Eminem blaring so the let his tyres down 😂😂
Buzzin am backshift this week and don't need to get up at 5
@elaine_ramsay2 been class so far 🎸🎤
Is it worth the aggravation to find yourself a job when there's nothing worth working for?

A need a weekend hobby. Don't even enjoy drinking anymore but there's fuck all else to do
@mcomiskey90 it's sound mate, got a taxi. Cheers but
Somebody gees a lift please! Al pay petrol
@steedie67 that lasted long 😏
Got a screen protector and a case on ma phone and a still managed to crack the screen. Why do bad things happen to good people?
@emilydowdall whatever I said, whatever I did I didn't meant it. I just want you back for good
@emilydowdall don't be like that 😢
@emilydowdall not a chance! Teetotal next two weeks 💪🏻
@emilydowdall everybody seems to be shocked when I have a weekend in haha. My body and bank balance canny handle it
@steedie67 25 tonicless days 😩
No had buckfast since a was in Benidorm and am having serious withdrawal symptoms. Hands aw shaky n that 🍾🍷
You're no Troy the gardener, you're Boaby the barman
Wee brer asked me to help with a project on Oasis for school and av done the whole thing. Pish he'll get the credit for it cos it's class
Everyday a get closer and closer to walking out ma job. Place is a fuckin shambles
Am just wan big walking bit ae heartburn. Got it 24/7 😩
@steedie67 only God can judge me and he loves the sesh
Walking in at this time to the family eating breakfast is actual horrible 😂 no ma fault am hardcore and yous urny, leave me be
